package:
ecl_time 0.60.9
Timing utilities are very dependent on the system api provided for their use. This package provides a means for handling different timing models. Current support
- posix rt : complete. - macosx : posix timers only, missing absolute timers. - win : none.
Daniel Stonier BSD http://wiki.ros.org/ecl_time https://github.com/stonier/ecl_core https://github.com/stonier/ecl_core/issues Daniel Stonier -->
